Name:
USS Bancroft
HMCS St. Francis
Builder: Bethlehem Shipbuilding Corporation, Fore River Shipyard, Quincy
Identification:
Hull number DD-256
Pennant number I93
Fate:
Transferred to Canada, 24 September 1940
Declared surplus, 1 April 1945; sank off Cape Cod en route to scrapping, July 1945
Range: 4,900 nmi (9,100 km; 5,600 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
4 × 4"/50 caliber gun
1 × 3"/23 caliber gun
12 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
